segments.text: Hello , Jason , there is going to be a screening of Final Destination 3 at our campus cinema tomorrow . I plan to go to see it .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Yeah , I love horror movies . Would you like to go with me tomorrow ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: No way . I will be scared out of my wits .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: That's funny , I didn't know a big fellow like you could be so soft and timid on the inside .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Hey , how would you like to taste my fist ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Alright , all joking aside , what kinds of moves do you like ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Um , let me see , romance , comedy . documentary , action , science fiction , animated and so on .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: That is to say , you like all genres except for horror movies .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Yeah . It seems like we don't speak the same language as far as movies are concerned .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Not quite . I also greatly enjoy romance and comedy .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: The Notebook is this type of movie .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Really ? I haven't heard of it .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Well then , this could be a nice opportunity to enjoy it together . I bet you'd love it .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Ok . I can't wait to see it . Let's go !
segments.speaker: S1
